parameters.name: confirm
parameters.description: With the Confirm boolean in the request, you can determine if you want to confirm the shipment in the same call or not. If the Boolean variable is true the shipment will be preannounced. If this is set to false, then an additional Confirming API request needs to be made.

AddressType.description: Address 02 is mandatory. It can either be placed in the Customer segment or in the Shipment segment. Note that if you put it in the Shipment segment, it should go into all Shipment segments.

CompanyName.description: This field has a dependency with the field Name. One of both fields must be filled mandatory; using both fields is also allowed. Mandatory when AddressType is 09.

Department.description: Send to specific department of a company

Doorcode.description: Door code of address. Mandatory for some international shipments.

FirstName.description: Remark: please add FirstName and Name (lastname) of the receiver to improve the parcel tracking experience of your customer.

Floor.description: Send to specific floor of a company

HouseNr.description: Mandatory for shipments to Benelux. Max. length is 5 characters (only for Benelux addresses). For Benelux addresses,this field should always be numeric.

Name.description: Last name of person. This field has a dependency with the field CompanyName. One of both fields must be filled mandatory; using both fields is also allowed. Remark: please add FirstName and Name (lastname) of the receiver to improve the parcel tracking experience of your customer.

Street.description: This field has a dependency with the field StreetHouseNrExt. One of both fields must be filled mandatory; using both fields simultaneously is discouraged.

StreetHouseNrExt.description: Combination of Street, HouseNr and HouseNrExt. Please see [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/browse-apis/send-and-track/labelling-webservice/) for the explanation.

Zipcode.description: Zipcode of the address. Mandatory for shipments to Benelux. Max length (NL) 6 characters,(BE;LU) 4 numeric characters

CollectionLocation.description: Code of delivery location at PostNL Pakketten

CustomerCode.description: Customer code as known at PostNL Pakketten

LabelSignature.description: GIF image of the signature (as a base64 encoded string) max size: 280x60 mm (1058x226 pixels). This can be used to automatically sign the customs forms. The value of this element can have a maximum size of 65536 characters. Note that the total request can have a maximum size of 200KB. Larger requests will not be accepted by the server for performance reasons. Requests that exceed this limit will not return a validation error,but a HTTP 404 error.

MessageTimeStamp.description: Date/time of sending the message. Format: dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss

Printertype.description: Printer type that will be used to process the label, e.g. Zebra printer or PDF See [Printer types](#tag/Reference-codes/Printer-types) for the available printer types.

Shipments.description: List of 1 or more Shipments. At least 1 shipment is required.

Addresses.description: List of 1 or more Address type elements. At least 1 address type is mandatory. See [Address types](#tag/Reference-codes/Address-types) for the available types.

AddressType.description: Type of the address. This is a code. You can find the possible values at [Address types](#tag/Reference-codes/Address-types)

CompanyName.description: This field has a dependency with the field Name. One of both fields must be filled mandatory; using both fields is also allowed. Mandatory when AddressType is 09.

Department.description: Send to specific department of a company

Doorcode.description: Door code of address. Mandatory for some international shipments.

FirstName.description: Remark: please add FirstName and Name (lastname) of the receiver to improve the parcel tracking experience of your customer.

Floor.description: Send to specific floor of a company

HouseNr.description: Mandatory for shipments to Benelux. Max. length is 5 characters (only for Benelux addresses). For Benelux addresses,this field should always be numeric.

Name.description: Last name of person. This field has a dependency with the field CompanyName. One of both fields must be filled mandatory; using both fields is also allowed. Remark: please add FirstName and Name (lastname) of the receiver to improve the parcel tracking experience of your customer.

Street.description: This field has a dependency with the field StreetHouseNrExt. One of both fields must be filled mandatory. Using both fields simultaneously is discouraged.

StreetHouseNrExt.description: Combination of Street, HouseNr and HouseNrExt. Please see [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/browse-apis/send-and-track/labelling-webservice/) for the explanation.

Zipcode.description: Zipcode of the address. Mandatory for shipments to Benelux. Max length (NL) 6 characters,(BE;LU) 4 numeric characters

Amounts.description: List of amount types. An amount represents a value of the shipment. Amount type 01 mandatory for COD-shipments, Amount type 02 mandatory for domestic insured shipments. Please see [Amount types](#tag/Reference-codes/Amount-types) for the available types.

AmountType.description: Amount type. Please see [Amount types](#tag/Reference-codes/Amount-types) for the available types.

BIC.description: BIC number,optional for COD shipments (mandatory for bank account number other than originating in The Netherlands)

Currency.description: Currency code according ISO 4217. E.g. EUR

IBAN.description: IBAN bank account number,mandatory for COD shipments. Dutch IBAN numbers are 18 characters

Value.description: Money value in EUR (unless value Currency is specified for another currency). Value format (N6.2): #####0.00 (2 digits behind decimal dot). Mandatory for COD, Insured products (with the exception of certain productcodes with a standard insured amount).

Barcode.description: Barcode of the shipment. This is a unique value. Note: If you leave this attribute out of your request an unique barcode will be generated automatically.

CodingText.description: Code used for logistic purposes (usually generated by the service itself and returned in the response). Please note that this must be provided when  using the Confirm API to confirm shipments where coding texts are required (e.g. letterbox parcels).

CollectionTimeStampStart.description: Starting date/time of the collection of the shipment. Format: dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm:ss

CollectionTimeStampEnd.description: Ending date/time of the collection of the shipment. Format: dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm:ss

Contacts.description: One or more ContactType elements belonging to a shipment. Mandatory in some cases. Please refer to the available [Contact types](#tag/Reference-codes/Contact-types) for the possible values.

ContactType.description: Type of the contact. This is a code. Please refer to the available [Contact types](#tag/Reference-codes/Contact-types) for the possible values.

Email.description: Email address of the contact. Mandatory in some cases. Please see [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/browse-apis/send-and-track/labelling-webservice/).

SMSNr.description: Mobile phone number of the contact. Mandatory in some cases. Please see [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/browse-apis/send-and-track/labelling-webservice/).

Content.description: Content of the shipment. Mandatory for Extra@Home shipments

CostCenter.description: Cost center of the shipment. This value will appear on your invoice

Customs.description: The Customs type is mandatory for non-EU shipments and not allowed for any other shipment types.

Certificate.description: Fill in if applicable, for specific items a export certificate is obliged, as proof that the item complies to the sanity regulations, [more information](https://ondernemersplein.kvk.nl/fytosanitair-of-veterinair-exportcertificaat-aanvragen/). Mandatory for Parcel shipments in the category type Commercial Goods, Commercial Sample and Returned Goods (Certificate, Invoice or License; at least 1 out of 3 must be selected)

License.description: Fill in if applicable. Mandatory for Parcel shipments in the category type Commercial Goods, Commercial Sample and Returned Goods (Certificate, Invoice or License; at least 1 out of 3 must be selected).

Invoice.description: Fill in the invoice number of the shipment. For a faster customs clearing process apply the invoice on the outside of the shipment. Mandatory for Parcel shipments in the category type Commercial Goods, Commercial Sample and Returned Goods (Certificate, Invoice or License; at least 1 out of 3 must be selected).

HandleAsNonDeliverable.description: Determines what to do when the shipment cannot be delivered the first time (if this is set to true,the shipment will be returned after the first failed attempt)

Currency.description: Currency code,only EUR and USS are allowed

ShipmentType.description: Type of shipment,possible values: Gift,Documents,Commercial Goods,Commercial Sample,Returned Goods

TrustedShipperID.description: 'Use only when available. Depending on the destination with this ID the customs process can be faster. Only fill in this customs reference number if the sender is registrated as Trusted Shipper in the country of destination'

ImporterReferenceCode.description: Importer reference code. Fill in a Tax Code or VAT number or Importer code. Depending on the destination with this reference the customs process can be faster.

TransactionCode.description: Code and accompanying description according to UPU Codelist 136. Codes to be used are shown below for your reference. Or see the [Reference data](#tag/Reference-codes/Transaction-codes).

TransactionDescription.description: Transaction description; see [here](#tag/Reference-codes/Transaction-codes) for common examples.

Content.description: The contents of the shipment. This section is mandatory (minimum once, maximum 5).

Quantity.description: Fill in the total of the item(s)

Weight.description: Net weight of goods in gram(gr)

Value.description: Commercial (customs) value of goods. Fill in the value of the item(s).

HSTariffNr.description: Specify every item with the standard HS commodity code (HS-code), [more information](https://tarief.douane.nl/arctictariff-public-web/#!/home)

CountryOfOrigin.description: Fill in the code of the country where the item was produced (ISO-code), [more information](https://www.iso.org/home.html)

DeliveryAddress.description: Delivery address specification. This field is mandatory when AddressType on the Address is 09.

DeliveryDate.description: Mandatory when using Mailbox Parcels (for generation of the coding rule) and delivery options like Evening/Morning/Sameday delivery etc.

Dimension.description: Note: Length, Width, Height values are about the order of the size and need to be filled in from the longest to the shortest value. For example: shipment’s official height is 700mm, width 500mm, length 300mm. The longest side (highest value) of 700mm needs to be entered at Length. Width value becomes 500mm, Height value: 300mm (the lowest). Entering the dimensions in the wrong order may result in incorrect shipping labels and longer delivery times. The maximum dimensions can be found in your PostNL contract.

Height.description: The shortest side of the shipment in millimeters (mm).

Length.description: The longest side of the shipment in millimeters (mm).

Volume.description: Volume of the shipment in centimeters (cm3). Mandatory for E@H-products.

Weight.description: Weight of the shipment in grams. Approximate weight suffices

Width.description: The second longest side of the shipment in millimeters (mm).

DownPartnerBarcode.description: Barcode of the downstream network partner of PostNL Parcels. Madatory for requesting Parcels Non-EU combilabel product codes.

DownPartnerID.description: Identification of the downstream network partner of PostNL Pakketten.

DownPartnerLocation.description: Identification of the location of the downstream network partner of PostNL Pakketten.

Groups.description: List of 0 or more Group types with data, grouping multiple shipments together. Mandatory for multicollo shipments. Please see [Guidelines](https://developer.postnl.nl/browse-apis/send-and-track/labelling-webservice/) (Multiple shipments) for more information.

GroupType.description: Group sort that determines the type of group that is indicated. This is a code. For possible values, please see [here](#tag/Reference-codes/Group-types)

GroupSequence.description: Sequence number of the collo within the complete shipment (e.g. collo 2 of 4) Mandatory for multicollo shipments

GroupCount.description: Total number of colli in the shipment (in case of multicolli shipments) Mandatory for multicollo shipments

MainBarcode.description: Main barcode for the shipment (in case of multicolli shipments) Mandatory for multicollo shipments

HazardousMaterial.description: Array of hazardous materials contained in the shipment

ToxicSubstanceCode.description: Toxic substance code as stated in the ADR agreement

AdditionalToxicSubstanceCode.description: Array of additional toxic substance codes as stated in the ADR agreement

TunnelCode.description: The code indicating for which category of tunnels passage is prohibited with these goods.

PackagingGroupCode.description: Code identifying the category of the packaging material.

GrossWeight.description: Gross weight of the goods in grams.

ChemicalTechnicalDescription.description: The chemical technical description of the goods.

ProductCodeCollect.description: Deprecated. Collection product code of a shipment.

ProductCodeDelivery.description: Product code of the shipment. See the [Products page](#tag/Product-codes) for possible products.

ProductOptions.description: Product options for the shipment, mandatory for certain products, see the [Products page](#tag/Product-codes).

Characteristic.description: The characteristic of the ProductOption. Mandatory for some products, please see the [Products page](#tag/Product-codes)

Option.description: The product option code for this ProductOption. Mandatory for some products, please see the [Products page](#tag/Product-codes)

ReceiverDateOfBirth.description: Date of birth. Mandatory for Age check products

Reference.description: Your own reference of the shipment. Mandatory for Extra@Home shipments; for E@H this is used to create your order number, so this should be unique for each request.

ReferenceCollect.description: Additional reference of the collect order of the shipment

ReturnBarcode.description: Return barcode of the shipment. PostNL will provide you with a separate customer code specifically for generating the returnBarcode. Mandatory for Label in the Box (return label) shipments.

TimeslotID.description: Deprecated. ID of the chosen timeslot as returned by the timeslot webservice

ExtraFields.description: Possibility to provide extra key-value pairs to the webservice. Not used at the moment.

MergedLabels.description: The merged label output; only returned if the printer type selected in your request merges the pdf labels into a single file (e.g. using GraphicFile|Merge).

items.description: Array of barcodes used in the shipment

Labeltype.description: Type of the label. See possible [Label types](#tag/Reference-codes/Label-types)

OutputType.description: Content type of the label, e.g. zebra of pdf.

ProductCodeDelivery.description: The product code of the shipment

Labels.description: All labels belonging to the selected product

Labeltype.description: Type of the label. See Guidelines

OutputType.description: Content type of the label, e.g. zebra of pdf. Note: It is not recommended to send .PDF files/labels directly to a Zebra printer. See Guidelines.

Barcode.description: The barcode used on the label

Warnings.description: Possible warnings. See the [Error Codes](#tag/Error-codes) for possible values

Errors.description: A list of errors returned from the webservice. See the [Error codes](#tag/Error-codes) for possible values.

Description.example: Incorrect address specified in address type Sender

message.example: Failed to resolve API Key variable 'request.header.apikey'
Too many requests. Rate limit exceeded!
